name: react-node-monolithic-app
description: Monolithic web app with client and server

scripts.install:client: cd client && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.install:server: cd server && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.start: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && node server.js
